title: [Large-scale] Mobile Learning (M-Learning) Based Social Sector Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Smartphone Usage and Understanding of Basic Social Science Terminology
context.additional_context: Integrating theory and practice through work-linked projects for current professionals, offering immersive learning experiences via VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can complete collaborative projects aimed at solving social issues with over 80% completion accuracy using mobile devices.
Learners can analyze community conflict management scenarios with 90% accuracy through VR simulations provided on an M-learning platform.
Learners can interact with peers and instructors in real-time in a BYOD environment and achieve 100% of weekly learning objectives.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
